channel.title: Apocalypse World: Jurassic Apocalypse
channel.description:
![JurassicApocalypse|500x500](upload://oucjsCj6T3FmAW0jNkY252pAWvF.jpeg)
Fridays in August, post-Gencon
We will be playing Apocalypse World 2nd edition. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP for each session you want to attend.
It was supposed to be the greatest tourist attraction on Earth -- dinosaurs, resurrected from extinction, inhabiting a tropical island paradise. But of course everything went wrong. The dinosaurs went on a rampage, and all contact with the mainland was lost. Those who survived had to find a new way to build a society. Resources are scarce, and violence is always on the horizon. But it's not all bad -- you get to ride a freaking dinosaur! We will be tweaking Vincent and Meguey Baker's Apocalypse World to tell the story of our humans trapped on an island full of prehistoric beasts. No prior knowledge of the system is required.
The X card, lines and veils, and the open door policy will be in effect. This event abides by the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
1. https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li0hzxb6Oz6QkrXpSbY [date=2019-08-09 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-09 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
2. https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li0iF7YQAb_XxitcBP3 [date=2019-08-16 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-16 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
3. https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li0iPH-hTxveyKgrg59 [date=2019-08-23 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-23 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
4. https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li0iZRunlGmgWROZ8F7 [date=2019-08-30 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-30 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]

item.title: Apocalypse World: Jurassic Apocalypse

@Stentor_Danielson wrote:

JurassicApocalypse1367×1367 418 KB

Fridays in August, post-Gencon

We will be playing Apocalypse World 2nd edition. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP for each session you want to attend.

It was supposed to be the greatest tourist attraction on Earth – dinosaurs, resurrected from extinction, inhabiting a tropical island paradise. But of course everything went wrong.
